text: Richard Samuel Benjamin (born May 22, 1938) is an American actor and movie director. He directed City Heat (1984), The Money Pit (1986) and Made in America (1993). He was the lead actor in the short-lived 1978 TV series "Quark" where he played the Captain of a Sanitation Starship as "Adam Quark" ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Richard Benjamin
